sdumitriu - (10:23): sburjan`: Online?  
Denis left at 10:44 (Quit: Leaving.  
sburjan` - (10:53): sdumitriu: yes  
sdumitriu - (10:53): Did you test the 2.5 release?  
sburjan` - (10:54): I tested the 2.5 snapshot right before you started the release  
sburjan` - (10:54): on firday  
sdumitriu - (10:54): http://maven.xwiki.org/releases/com/xpn/xwiki/products/xwiki-enterprise-jetty-hsqldb/2.5/  
sburjan` - (10:55): okay. I'm on it  
sburjan` - (10:57): when do you want to officially release ?  
sdumitriu - (10:58): Monday or Tuesday  
sburjan` - (10:58): ok. so you need it tested till tomorrow  
sdumitriu - (10:59): If you can  
sburjan` - (10:59): I thought you need it asap  
sdumitriu - (10:59): No pressure  
sburjan` - (10:59): asap .. like .. now :)  
sburjan` - (10:59): okay
